template.description: Getting contact information and messages from the Unicef RapidPro instance
template.name: Unicef-RapidPro

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.value: INSERT INTO unicef_rapidpro.public.message_label(message_id, label_name, contact_id, msg_date) SELECT '${ID:replaceEmpty("null")}', '${name:replaceEmpty("null")}', '${urn:replaceEmpty("null")}', '${date:replaceEmpty("null")}' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM unicef_rapidpro.public.message_label WHERE message_id='${ID:replaceEmpty("null")}' AND label_name ='${name:replaceEmpty("null")}')

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.value: INSERT INTO unicef_rapidpro.public.message(message_id,contact_id, contact_name, direction, text,msg_date) values ('${message_id:replaceEmpty("null")}', '${contact_id:replaceEmpty("null")}', '${contact_name:replaceEmpty("null")}', '${direction:replaceEmpty("null")}','${formatted_text:replaceEmpty("null")}', '${msg_date_raw:replaceEmpty("null")}') ON CONFLICT (message_id) DO UPDATE SET contact_id = '${contact_id:replaceEmpty("null")}',contact_name ='${contact_name:replaceEmpty("null")}'

entry.key: Permit Whitespace and Comments in Pattern

value.name: Permit Whitespace and Comments in Pattern

entry.key: Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern

value.name: Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern

entry.key: Permit Whitespace and Comments in Pattern
Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern

entry.value: INSERT INTO unicef_rapidpro.public.contact(pregnant, child, unsubscribed, id, reg_date, mother_age, duration, language, child_age, edd, child_dob) values (${pregnant:replaceEmpty("null")}, ${child:replaceEmpty("null")}, ${unsubscribed:replaceEmpty("null")}, '${id:replaceEmpty("null")}', '${reg_date:replaceEmpty("null")}', ${mother_age:replaceEmpty("null")}, ${duration:replaceEmpty("null")}, '${language:replaceEmpty("null")}',${child_age:replaceEmpty("null")}, '${edd:replaceEmpty("null")}', '${child_dob:replaceEmpty("null")}') ON CONFLICT(id) DO UPDATE SET pregnant =${pregnant:replaceEmpty("null")}, child =${child:replaceEmpty("null")},unsubscribed=${unsubscribed:replaceEmpty("null")},reg_date='${reg_date:replaceEmpty("null")}',mother_age=${mother_age:replaceEmpty("null")},duration =${duration:replaceEmpty("null")},language='${language:replaceEmpty("null")}',child_age=${child_age:replaceEmpty("null")},edd='${edd:replaceEmpty("null")}',child_dob='${child_dob:replaceEmpty("null")}'
